articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Google says it’s fixed Gmail issues with spam and misclassification - TechCrunch
articles.description: If your Gmail account doesn’t seem to be working properly today, you’re not alone.
articles.content:
If your Gmail account didn’t seem to be working properly Saturday, you were not alone. But Google says the issue has been be resolved.
